item.title: Singapore Air Shares Slump as Air India Loss Hits Earnings
item.description: Singapore Airlines Ltd. share’s slumped the most in almost a year after the carrier posted a sharp decline in quarterly profit.

item.title: US Threatens to Upend Delta-Aeromexico Deal in Mexico Orders
